snippet: A mall shopper shot and killed a 16-year-old boy who attempted a robbery on the sidewalk outside, possibly in pursuit of a pair of limited-edition athletic shoes, police in southwest Ohio said Monday....

headline.print_headline: Police: Teen Shot Over Possible Athletic-Shoe Envy
headline.main: Police: Teen Shot Over Possible Athletic-Shoe Envy

lead_paragraph: A mall shopper shot and killed a 16-year-old boy who attempted a robbery on the sidewalk outside, possibly in pursuit of a pair of limited-edition athletic shoes, police in southwest Ohio said Monday.
